alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Barnwell (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 4:21PM EDT until July 08 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Barnwell County in central South Carolina... South central Aiken County in central South Carolina... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 420 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Williston, or 10 miles northwest of Barnwell, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Barnwell, Williston, New Ellenton, Snelling, Kline, Elko and Barnwell County Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
